,,, 2A, 4.2V-16V Input Fast Transient Synchronous Step-down Converter;MPS;MP1492;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.85.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = aerohive |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/02/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none (internal) |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976400101" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The Atheros WiSoC used is assumed to be AR9331. :Flash size is per the below dmesg output. {{WiFiCert|WFA13247|11/08/2011}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://docs.aerohive.com/330000/docs/help/english/6.6r1/hm/full/help.htm#hw/br/BR100.htm Hardware Reference] ==Serial== ===info dump=== {{SCollapse|stock dmesg â€¢ >> . |
